title: muruga vaLLal pOl
sahitya:
muruga vaLLal pOl karuNai koLvOruNDO bhuviyil


anupallavi

  tirupparankunrattai iruppiDamAik-koNDu tiruvaruLai aLLiyaLLaiyE tarum uLLam uDaiya guru


caraNam    ara neriyE kuriyAga pira nalamE peridAga urudiyODu karudiDum periyOr vAzhvil
perumidamODu kUDum pErinba vAri peruga krpai purindE varum perumai sirandOngum
